articles.description: Leap seconds are added to coordinated universal time in order to account for changes in the Earth’s rate of spin. But they really confuse computers, which is why Facebook-owner Meta wants to get rid of them.
articles.content:
Facebooks parent company wants new ways to calculate time
Photo by Gabe Ginsberg/Getty Images
Since 1972 there have been 27 leap seconds: additional seconds added to the worlds common clock Coordin… [+3750 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Samsung's new Galaxy S22 color is so purple it named it twice - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung’s Galaxy S22 is launching in a new purple color today, which the company is officially calling “Bora Purple.” It goes on sale on August 10th for $799.99, same as the original Galaxy S22.
articles.content:
The Galaxy S22, now in purple.
Image: Samsung
